title: Computer Accessories
description: This website is parts manufacturer seller website. Where a lot of parts are available for wholesale sales and you can also add products and delete them. ## Features  1.On this website, you can order any tools when you log in to this site.  2. Here have a client and an admin dashboard to control website content.  3. For the admin role, I implement JWT for verification.  4. You can also add reviews about our services.  5. Technology: React, React Routing, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI, Firebase Authentication, Express, MongoDB, Heroku, React hook form, React query.

title: Electronic warehouse
description: This website is a warehouse inventory management website. # Features -- 1. This application usually helps deller and wholesale retailer. 2.. On this website, you can add, restock and delete products.  3.. Single Page web application, Google and Email Authentication (Sign In | Sign Up)  4.. Dealers can update and manage their stokes. 5.. Technology: React, React Routing, Bootstrap, Firebase Authentication, Express, MongoDB, Heroku.
